app.name: spyglass
app.summary: This is an Atrenta app to generate the project file of the design to run it in SpyGlass. The App takes user inputs for the design-top name and the SpyGlass project file name: eg-: write_spyglass_proc foo run_spy.prj, where foo is the design-top and run_spy.prj is the SpYglass Project file name. To run SpyGlass, ensure that the required software and the licenses are available. Invoke SpyGlass using the command: spyglass -project design-top.prj. Follow the steps outlined in the SpyGlass user guide.
app.display: Atrenta SpyGlass for Lint and CDC

proc.name: write_spyglass_script
proc.summary: This proc generates the spyglass project file
